name: XLSX2JSON
description: Gets contents from XLSX and returns them in JSON
author: Miguel Mejia <mamcsoft92@gmail.com>

params.name: cells
params.displayName: Range (For multiple sheets separate the ranges by commas Eg. A1:D50,B3:Z100)

params.name: index
params.displayName: Sheet Index (Start form 0 and for multiple sheets separate the indexes by commas Eg. 2,5,8)
